news.title: Gardaí arrest former TD in probe over his dead parents’ pensions
news.summary: A former TD is under investigation for allegedly claiming the pensions of his deceased parents, the  Irish Independent  can reveal.

news.title: Manhunt underway for sniper after influential Trump ally Charlie Kirk (31) shot dead in US
news.summary: Police and federal agents mounted an intense manhunt on Thursday for the sniper believed to have fired the single gunshot that killed conservative activist Charlie Kirk as he was fielding questions about gun violence during a university appearance.

news.title: Who was Charlie Kirk? How Reagan-loving Chicago schoolboy became a millionaire MAGA leader and key Trump ally
news.summary: Charlie Kirk, who was shot dead on Wednesday at the age of 31, had established himself as one of the most prominent and powerful conservative voices in the United States.

news.title: Dylan McGrath’s Brasserie Sixty6 restaurant owed creditors more than €1m
news.summary: A liquidator’s report in the company that was behind Dylan McGrath’s now closed Brasserie Sixty6 restaurant in Dublin has laid bare the scale of the debts that were owed by the business.

news.title: RTÉ will not take part in Eurovision 2026 ‘if the participation of Israel goes ahead’
news.summary: RTÉ has said it will not take part in the 2026 Eurovision if Israel continues to be a participant in the song contest.

news.title: FAI say ‘right people in place’ as John Martin replaces Marc Canham with Shane Robinson confirmed as Technical Officer
news.summary: The FAI have tasked ex-League of Ireland player John Martin with the job of driving the direction of the game here after the former Shamrock Rovers CEO was confirmed as their new Director of Football.

news.title: Peter Mandelson withdrawn as UK’s ambassador to US over Jeffrey Epstein ties
news.summary: Peter Mandelson has been withdrawn as ambassador to the US after emails revealed the depth of his relationship with paedophile financier Jeffrey Epstein.

news.title: ‘The joy, cheers and hugs are something I’ll never forget’ – why more Irish couples are going all in on gender reveal parties
news.summary: From Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker to Katy Perry and Orlando Bloom, finding out the gender of your baby in front of family and friends has become something of a trend.

news.title: Stay Well: I want to use testosterone therapy to restore my libido after menopause. What are the risks?
news.summary: Testosterone replacement therapy (TRT) in menopause is currently a hot topic, with social media chatter suggesting it can turbo-charge libido and that every menopausal woman should be on it.

news.title: Passengers behaving badly: Airlines banned smoking; is it now time to test alcohol-free flights?
